entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with rain showers changing to periods of snow late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
